title.narrative: Ecuador Risk Mitigation and Emergency Recovery Project

description.narrative: To support the recovery of basic and productive services in selected sectors in affected areas in case of an Eligible Disaster and strengthen resilience to natural disasters and macroeconomic shocks

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Appointment of Auditor. Schedule 2. Section II.B.4 | Description :The Borrower shall select and contract, by nolater than six months after the Effective Date, and thereafter maintain, throughout the implementation of the Project, the servicesof a qualified and experienced auditor acceptable to the Bank, under terms of reference satisfactory to the Bank, to serve asindependent external auditor for a period of at least three consecutive years.

title.narrative: Grievances related to delivery of project benefits that are addressed-(number)
Grievances registered related to delivery of project benefits addressed (%)
Number of hectares of crops protected against flooding
Number of people protected through flood mitigation works
Number of people benefiting from new equipment in the health sector after an Eligible Disaster occurs
Improved macroeconomic modeling, including better understanding of economic impacts of climate change
Number of households receiving emergency cash transfers through the Government of Ecuador payment delivery mechanisms
i) Methodology to allocate budget ceilings for PGE institutions updated/designed and ii) modalities to amend budget during the fiscal year designed
Predictive methodology for monitoring and control of credit operations financed with public debt and monitoring of World Bank loansdeveloped
